solution:
We note that $\sqrt{9 \cdot 9^t} = 3 \cdot 3^t$. The equation becomes: \begin{align*}
3 \cdot 3^t + 3 \cdot 3^t &= 18\\
\Rightarrow 6 \cdot 3^t &= 18 \\
\Rightarrow 3^t &= 3.
\end{align*}Therefore, $t = \boxed{1}$.
chatgpt_solution:
$3\cdot3^t + \sqrt{9\cdot9^t} = 18$
First, we can simplify the square root: $3\cdot3^t + 3\cdot3^t = 18$
That means $6\cdot3^t = 18$, so $3^t = 3$ and $t=\boxed{1}$.
